DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis: Red wine intake but not other alcoholic beverages together with a fat diet will decrease inflammatory factors and lipid peroxidation and decrease antioxidant capacity in healthy people after a five days period.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Alcoholic Beverages in Pro-inflammatory and Antioxidant Profile After an Oral Fat Diet
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteers Individuals with a plasma cholesterol level > 220 mg/dl Smokers
